com.atakmap.android.navigation.views.loadout

Class LoadoutToolsDropDown

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • com.atakmap.android.navigationstack.NavigationStackItem
        • com.atakmap.android.navigation.views.loadout.LoadoutToolsDropDown
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, android.view.View.OnDragListener, android.view.View.OnLayoutChangeListener, NavButtonManager.OnModelChangedListener, NavButtonManager.OnModelListChangedListener, LoadoutManager.OnLoadoutChangedListener, NavigationStackManager, NavigationStackView, MappingAdapterEventReceiver<MappingVM>

    public class LoadoutToolsDropDown
extends NavigationStackItem
implements android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, NavButtonManager.OnModelListChangedListener, NavButtonManager.OnModelChangedListener, LoadoutManager.OnLoadoutChangedListener, MappingAdapterEventReceiver<MappingVM>, android.view.View.OnLayoutChangeListener, android.view.View.OnDragListener
    Drop-down that displays the list of available loadout tools (overflow menu) By default this only shows tools that are not part of the current loadout In edit mode all tools are shown and can be added or removed from the loadout

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.content.BroadcastReceiver

        android.content.BroadcastReceiver.PendingResult
